casebody.head_matter:
635 A.2d 113
Roger Peter BUEHL, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; Joseph Lehman, Acting Commissioner; Theodore Otto, III, Chief Counsel; and Joseph Lehman, Acting Commissioner Pennsylvania Department of Corrections; Donald Vaughn, Superintendent State Correctional Institution at Graterford, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Dec. 7, 1992.
Decided Nov. 8, 1993.
Roger Peter Buehl, pro se.
Before NIX, C.J., FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, and MONTEMURO, JJ.
